    • Method Detail

      • add

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> add(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> arr)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception

        A function that inserts a row into a deliverydetails table in DB

        Parameters:
        arr - - ArrayList of Object that represents the data that we want to insert as row in DB
        Returns:
        myMsgArr-An ArrayList of Objects that represnets the answer from DB
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the Exception can be throwed in 2 situations, if there is a problem with the query that sent to the DB. or if the returned values is not from the type we expected.

      • update

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> update(java.lang.Object obj)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Function that updates a line within the DB if necessary.
        Parameters:
        obj - - need to be instance of DeliveryDetails,than it parse into a proper Structure that needed to be write as row in DB
        Returns:
        myMsgArr - An ArrayList of Objects that represnets the answer from DB

      • getDeliveryByID

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> getDeliveryByID(java.math.BigInteger deliveryID)
                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        A function which sends a request to the DB to receive a line from the DB's delivery by the deliveryID
        Parameters:
        deliveryID - - The ID of the delivery we want to get
        Returns:
        ArrayList with the data we pulled from the DB
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the Exception can be if there is a problem with the query that sent to the DB.

      • handleGet

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> handleGet(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> obj)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception

        A function that get objects from the DB and calls parse. after parse it pushes the data back as a report

        Parameters:
        obj - - an array list of objects the represent row in deliverydetails table in DB
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Objects with all the information that related to the asking report
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This function uses parse that can throw an exception

      • parse

        DeliveryDetails parse(java.math.BigInteger deliveryID,
                      java.math.BigInteger storeID,
                      java.time.LocalDateTime date,
                      java.lang.Boolean isImmediate)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        A function that gets all data as parameters, finds the required StoreID, and creates a deliveryDetails instance with all associated data.
        Parameters:
        deliveryID - - The Required deliveryID to the new instance.
        storeID - - The Required storeID to the new instance.
        date - - The Required date to the new instance.
        isImmediate - - represents if the delivery is immediate
        Returns:
        new DeliveryDetails instance with all the required data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Can be injected in two cases, first case if there is a problem with the query of receiving a store by ID. A second case if one of the data received does not match what we expected.
